thread.title_full: Tom Hiddleston finally addresses his short relationship with Taylor Swift | hollywood | Hindustan Times

title: Tom Hiddleston finally addresses his short relationship with Taylor Swift | hollywood | Hindustan Times
text:
A photo posted by Us Weekly (@usweekly) on Dec 22, 2016 at 1:30pm PST 
“It was real. Taylor is an amazing woman. She’s generous and kind and lovely, and we had the best time,” the 35-year-old actor said. 
Swift, 26, had just ended her relationship with Calvin Harris when she met Hiddleston at the 2016 Met Gala. And the British actor said both of them were looking for a genuine connection at the time. Feb 8, 2017 at 5:22pm PST 
“So we decided to go out for dinner, we decided to travel... She’s incredible,” he said. 
But with the paparazzi following their every move, staying connected was not so easy. A photo posted by taylor swift (@ts_updates89) on Feb 8, 2017 at 12:11pm PST 
“A relationship in the limelight... A relationship always takes work. And it’s not just the limelight. It’s everything else,” Hiddleston added. 
Follow @htshowbiz for more
